what: Calculate the values of the polynomial spline at a given vector — GENERATE_PHI
title: Calculate the values of the polynomial spline at a given vector — GENERATE_PHI
text: Calculate values polynomial spline given vector

title: Calculate the values of the polynomial spline at a given vector — GENERATE_PHI
Calculate the values of the polynomial spline at a given vector — GENERATE_PHI
text: x predictor variable (vector). Missing values allowed. knot internal breakpoints (.e., breakpoints without two ending points) define spline. default NULL, results basis ordinary polynomial regression. Typical values mean median one knot, quantiles knots. See also Boundary.knots. degree non-negative integer degree piece-wise polynomial. default value 3 cubic splines. Zero degree allowed function, difference compared bs function package splines. Note order polynomial equals degree plus one. boundary 2-dimensional boundary points anchor B-spline basis. default, rangle non-NA data. knots Boundary.knots supplied, basis parameters depend x. Data can extend beyound Boundary.knots. coeff_spline coefficients variables evaluated corresponding B-spline basis matrix included intercept. length coeff_spline equals df degre + length(knots) + 1 (due presence intercept).

title: Calculate the values of the polynomial spline at a given vector — GENERATE_PHI
text: matrix dimension length(x) df = degree + length(knots) (plus one intercept included). Attributes correspond arguments specificed returned useage functions package.

title: Calculate the values of the polynomial spline at a given vector — GENERATE_PHI
code: library(VarEst2Phase) GENERATE_PHI(x = c(1, 2, 3), knot = c(0.25, 0.75), degree = 2, boundary = c(0, 1), coeff_spline = c(0.1, 0.2, 0.3)) #> Error in bSpline(x = x, knots = knot, degree = degree, Boundary.knots = boundary,     intercept = TRUE): could not find function "bSpline"
